summary: Standalone plugin for adding many of the missing weapons in Perkus Maximus using Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition, PrivateEye's Heavy Armory, and Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/9aCzUkt.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=5][color=red]This is a standalone plugin for Perkus Maximus.  You do not need to (and should not) install the mods this plugin uses (Wot3e MoS, Heavy Armory, or Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons).[/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=yellow]You still need to run the PatchusMaximus patcher to balance these weapons, they do have the proper PerMa tags but your XML stats may be different then mine.[/color][/center]
[color=red]If you like this mod please remember to endorse [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892/]Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21120/]Heavy Armory[/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10171/]Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons[/url] as well.[/color]
[b][u]
What does this plugin contain?[/u][/b]
PerMa, like it's predecessor SkyRe, contains a slew of new weaponry each belonging to a more complex bleed, armor, and stagger categorization.  Unfortunately there is still quite a few gaps in having a materials for each weapon variety.  This mod is a attempt to fill out some of the many missing pieces using a combined set of models and textures from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12892/]Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21120/]Heavy Armory[/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10171/]Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons[/url] all pre-balanced and fully-integrated for Perkus Maximus.  The complete list of weapons included in this pack follows:

* Daedric: Shortspear
* Dawnguard: Battleaxe, Battlestaff, Halberd, Mace, Maul
* Dragonbone: Battlestaff, Halberd, Hatchet, Katana, Maul, Nodachi, Shortsword, Tanto, Wakizashi
* Dwarven: Battlestaff
* Ebony: Katana, Nodachi, Shortspear, Tanto, Wakizashi
* Elven: Battlestaff, Katana, Nodachi, Tanto, Wakizashi
* Forsworn: Dagger, Shortspear, Warhammer
* Glass: Katana, Nodachi, Tanto, Wakizashi
* Imperial: Dagger, Mace, Shortspear
* Nordic: Battlestaff, Halberd, Partisan, Shortspear, Shortsword
* Orcish: Battlestaff, Shortspear
* Silver: Mace, Shortspear
* Stalhrim: Battlestaff, Halberd, Partisan, Shortspear, Shortsword

Also included in this mod is a set of left hand meshes for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

[color=yellow]Note on leveled lists[/color]
I haven't had a lot of time to test this in the official release version of PerMa (I beta tested some earlier versions during the creation of this mod) and the PerMa patcher now takes care of assigning weapons to leveled lists. [u]Please let me know if you see odd inconsistencies[/u] (such as looting a Nordic item when you are level 3) and I'll see what I can do about tweaking drops.

[color=green]Closing Thoughts[/color]
This is a pretty simple mod, I created it since it wasn't very clean to install the entirety of Weapons of the 3rd Era MoS Edition and Wulfharths Dragonbone Weapons.  It created a lot of crafting clutter and duplicate recipes which my slightly anal-retentive self has issues with.  

I am NOT a model creator though so all credit must be given to masterofshadows, privateeye, and Wulfharth for their work.  I'd love to also expand this plugin to fill out more of the missing gaps in PerMa; things like Scimitar's, Mauls, etc. but it beyond my abilities to create them.  If you have any suggestions of other mods that might work and can put me in contact with their mod authors I'd be happy to think about adding them to this pack.
Thanks!
author: tortugapir8
